content: with two tutorials in one pattern this download has everything you need to make a sleeping mat out of plastic grocery bags this pattern includes detailed instruction with pictures of how to make plarn which is plastic yarn out of grocery bags there is also a pattern for the sleeping mat the plarn instructions are useful even if you wish to make something other than a mat simply use the plarn like any other super bulky yarn the sleeping mat is super simple to crochet but the plarn is a little difficult to work with until you get used to it so i don t recommend this as a first-time crochet project however it makes a wonderful second or third crochet project i donate these sleeping mats to a local charity my church works with and they distribute them to those in need we get wonderful feedback from the recipients about them please consider asking a local charity if they could use mats like this not only is this a great charity project it also keeps lots of plastic out of landfills the pattern includes both condensed and complete detailed instructions use whichever you prefer i m offering this pattern completely free in the hopes it is useful to you or can help someone in need happy crafting
